EmailTemplate.description: Notify User about Trial Expiration Org in Classic Mode
EmailTemplate.name: Notify User about Trial Expiration Org Classic
EmailTemplate.subject: Important! Your Org {!Organization.Id} - {!Organization.Name} has been expired
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
You are receiving this email because your Org {!Organization.Id} - {!Organization.Name} has been expired.
- If you wish to extend it, you can do it throughout this link -> https://central.qlabs.sfdc.sh/q-extender passing as input your Org Id -> {!Organization.Id}. (VPN required)
- You can login to your Org via -> https://login.salesforce.com/
Regards,
